attributes.action: Bank Holiday when 3rd in line to the throne is born.
attributes.additional_details:
Over the past few years, Great Britain has celebrated many events which have brought all 4 nations together in celebration of the isles and all that we have become.

With another defining moment in Great Britain happening in 2013, and to ensure we can all relish in this moment as we anticipate the birth of  the new heir to the throne, we as a community should be allowed a day off to celebrate this great historical moment. This will allow Great Britain to continue to community and to reflect on our history and culture.
